Sentencas: At the electrode/interconnect interface in reversible solid oxide fuel cells (RSOFC), a contact paste is applied during stack fabrication.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Careful selection of a contact paste material (CPM) is essential for improving the robustness of the RSOFC stack.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: For the successful industrialization of RSOFC technology, development of optimized CPM is required.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Herein, three lanthanum-based perovskite compositions, LaNi0.6Fe0.2Cu0.2O3-delta (LNFCu), LaNi0.6Fe0.3Cr0.1O3-delta (LNFCr), and LaNi0.5Co0.2Cu0.3O3-delta (LNCCu) were investigated as air electrode CPMs employed in between Crofer 22 APU interconnect (IC) and La0.3Ca0.7Fe0.7Cr0.3O3-delta (LCFCr) electrode.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: More specifically, the three candidates were screened for thermal expansion coefficient (TEC), chemical compatibility with adjacent stack components, area specific resistance (ASR), and their performance as an air electrode CPM in a symmetrical LCFCr RSOFC.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: All three materials show good chemical compatibility with both the IC and LCFCr, excellent match of TEC with cell components, as well as markedly low ASR values.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Most notably, from electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) study, LNFCr, and LNCCu CPMs exhibit polarization resistance values (Rp), at 800 degrees C, of ca.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: 0.83 S2 cm2, which is comparable to that of Au (0.63 S2 cm2), a material commonly regarded as the state-of-the-art.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks

Sentencas: Of the three CPMs studied, it was concluded that LNFCr is the best candidate.
Titulo: Evaluation of perovskite-type contact paste materials for reversible solid oxide fuel cell stacks
